title: Galleria at Crystal Run Merchants to Thank Those Vaccinated at GCR Vaccination Site - Galleria at Crystal Run
author: Galleriacrystalrun
description: Galleria at Crystal Run will offer discounts and special offers to individuals who have been vaccinated on location, in an effort to incentivize New Yorkers to receive their COVID vaccine. Individuals with Galleria at Crystal Run on their vaccine cards will receive a list of special deals/offers from participating venues.
cleaned_text: Run will offer discounts and special offers to individuals who have been vaccinated on location, in an effort to incentivize New Yorkers to receive their COVID vaccine. Individuals with Galleria at Crystal Run on their vaccine cards will receive a list of special deals/offers from participating venues.
